name: New Kernel Driver Via SC.EXE
description: Detects creation of a new service (kernel driver) with the type "kernel"
false_positives: Rare legitimate installation of kernel drivers via sc.exe
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\sc.exe AND process.command_line:(*create* OR *config*) AND process.command_line:*binPath* AND process.command_line:*type* AND process.command_line:*kernel*)`
